description: 1) you could search with keywords. 2) it had a little side-panel where you could list your to do tasks - just simple text. This would every day remind you when you open the application, and when a task is done you copy/paste into the diary and delete it in the sidepanel.

Brauch sowas für meine technische Dokumentation, wollte was ganz einfaches, unkompliziertes ohne Schnick Schnack.
Gefunden!
